segment.text: You may be wondering who I am, but that doesn't really matter at this point.
I was so close to overthrowing the castle by using the @ as ransom.
But you just had to intervene and ruin everything.
Speaking of the @, did you know how easy it was to lure $ out of the castle?
Well, # believed every word that I said.

action.name: You defeated the monster who kidnapped the @.
